title: Strava redesigns their app navigation to make it easier to track rides & find friends
content:
One of the most used cycling apps continues to get better. Over the past year, Strava has implemented more than 70 updates to their popular app. Now, they’re updating the main navigation bar to make it even easier to use. Open the app, and the most notable change takes place in the navigation bar that’s […]

The post Strava redesigns their app navigation to make it easier to track rides & find friends appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
